column1: veronica m. snyder| veronica m. snyder. died: june 11
column4: veronica m. snyder (nee barry) beloved wife of the late paul snyder; devoted mother of carolyn mroz and her husband robert
column5: diane stackwick and her husband michael and jackie snyder; loving grandmother of shawn shaw
column8: scott holt and mathew scoll; cherished great grandmother of seven great grandchildren; also survived by many nieces
column10: family and friends. a funeral service will be held at the family owned duda-ruck funeral home of dundalk
column12: 7922 wise ave. on thursday at 10 am. interment gardens of faith cemetery. friends may call on wednesday from 3 to 5 and 7 to 9 pm.
